page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN ROSSINGTON
page.content:
{ {BUSES }The most frequented form of transport in Rossington is the bus service. Buses run from Rosssington to Edlington via Doncaster. Bus fares are low, costing only 15 pence to Doncaster. Buses run every 15 minutes, there are four routes and many bus stops ensure that buses are within a short walk of most Rossington homes.
{BICYCLES} Rossington is very flat and cycling is very popular either for travelling to work or for shopping in the village.
{LORRIES AND CARS} Lorries travel through Rossington either to the pit or to the other industries or to shops. Many private cars are used for business or pleasure.
